verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Concerning the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, even these are my <S%H4150>feasts<s%>.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%>: but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%>, an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: it is the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.
These are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, even <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in their <S%H4150>seasons<s%>.
In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%>.

And on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the same <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye must <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> ye shall have an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

But ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, When ye be <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto you, and shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thereof, then ye shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>: sheaf: or, handful: Heb. omer

And he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%> for you: on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> it.

And ye shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> when ye <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> an he <S%H3532>lamb<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>: and the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> thereof shall be of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor parched <S%H7039>corn<s%>, nor green <S%H3759>ears<s%>, until the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5704>that<s%> ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto your <S%H430>God<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5608>count<s%> unto you from the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that ye <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the wave <S%H8573>offering<s%>; <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>complete<s%>:

Even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> shall ye <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Ye shall bring <S%H935>out<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%>: they shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>; they shall be <S%H644>baken<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>; they are the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>: they shall be for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, with their meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%>, even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Then ye shall <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>: they shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> on the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that it may be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And when ye <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%>, thou shalt not make clean <S%H3615>riddance<s%> of the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of thy <S%H7704>field<s%> when thou <S%H7114>reapest<s%>, neither shalt thou <S%H3950>gather<s%> any <S%H3951>gleaning<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%>: thou shalt <S%H5800>leave<s%> them unto the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, and to the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, shall ye have a <S%H7677>sabbath<s%>, a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> of <S%H8643>blowing<s%> of trumpets, an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein: but ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H389>Also<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> there shall be a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%>: it shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>, and <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: for it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
For whatsoever <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that shall not be <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, he shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And whatsoever <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> in that <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, the same <S%H5315>soul<s%> will I <S%H6>destroy<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

It shall be unto you a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%>, and ye shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%>: in the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, from <S%H6153>even<s%> unto <S%H6153>even<s%>, shall ye <S%H7673>celebrate<s%> your <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>. celebrate: Heb. rest
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>: ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein.

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: it is a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>; and ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein. solemn: Heb. day of restraint

These are the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which ye shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%>, to <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, and drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%>, every <S%H1697>thing<s%> upon <S%H3117>his<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>:

Beside the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and beside your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, and beside all your <S%H5088>vows<s%>, and beside all your freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%>, which ye <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Also in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, when ye have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath<s%>, and on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H7677>sabbath<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3947>take<s%> you on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H6529>boughs<s%> of <S%H1926>goodly<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, <S%H3709>branches<s%> of <S%H8558>palm<s%> trees, and the <S%H6057>boughs<s%> of <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>; and ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>. boughs of goodly trees: Heb. fruit of, etc

And ye shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%>. It shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: ye shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
Ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; all that are <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H249>born<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%>:

That your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I made the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%>, when I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
